oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bo Diddley Live at the Lone Star Café - 1978-08-08
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from the Lone Star Café live show. The tape features a live performance of Bo Diddley (musician). The Lone Star Café show is presented by Mort Cooperman, Bill McGivney and the WHN radio network. The recording of Bo Diddley is from August 08, 1978.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bo Diddley
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) An unidentified host introduces Bo Diddley -- (00:14) Janis Joplin (Bo Diddley) -- (05:55) I'm a Man (Bo Diddley) -- (15:57) Diddley reflects on his stage name -- (16:48) Unidentified tune (Bo Diddley) -- (33:12) You Can't Catch Me (Bo Diddley) -- (44:18) Diddley thanks the audience and jokes about his laugh -- (47:56) Unidentified tune (Bo Diddley)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Diddley, Bo;
